data.description: Parse and Format DateTimes using Strptime
data.similar:
Related to DateTime.pm - base module for all DateTime functionality.
    Similar to parts of Date::Manip but is a DateTime module
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DateTime::Format::Strptime parses date-times into DateTime objects
    for use with the DateTime suite using the standard *nix strptime
    syntax. For completeness the module also includes strftime for
    formating DateTimes, but this is just an invisible pass-through to
    the strftime in the core DateTime module.
